## Current Projects

* [__(Re)Buildung Trust?__](https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/VGBRS)<br />In this project we investigate the effects of open science badges on perceived trustworthiness in journal articles.
* [__Capturing beliefs on the relation of theory and practice__](https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/JH6RX)<br />In this project we established and tested an instrument to measure beliefs concerning the relation of theory and practice in the teaching profession.
* Systematic Review on adaptive teaching
* Adaptive teaching with tablets (TabletBW)
* [__Computer-based formative Feedback on writing__](https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/Q4TU9)<br />A meta-analysis on effects and border conditions
* [__TPACK self-report assessments__](http://dx.doi.org/10.23668/psycharchives.4226)<br />Another jingle-jangle fallacy? Examining the validity of Technological Pedagogical and Content Knowledge (TPACK) self-report assessments
* [__MapOSR: Mapping Open Science Research__](https://www.researchgate.net/project/Mapping-Open-Science-Research-A-Systematic-Review-of-Empirical-Studies-on-Open-Science)<br />A Systematic Review of Empirical Studies on Open Science
